pages.text: The $(item)Aquatic Body$() is a handy silk commonly used by travellers of the sea.$(br)While wearing it, the wearer will magically be pushed towards the direction they're looking at, considering that they are in water and not sneaking.$(br)Water souls can also breathe in water while wearing it, in addition to the enhanced effect of this bauble.
An Aquatic Body is created with the $(l:manipulation/entry_basin)Infusion Basin$(), by infusing $(l:alchemy/entry_matter)Maganized Matter$() with $(li)Water Essence$(li)Body Essence$(li)Air Essence
